sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './TermsOfService.css'; const TermsOfService = () => { return (

Terms of Service

Last Updated: [Date]

1. Introduction

Welcome to Xplore! By using our website, products, and services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please review them carefully.

2. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using Xplore, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these terms, as well as our Privacy Policy.

3. Description of Services

Xplore offers tour and travel booking, connecting users with guides, agencies, and providing resources for travelers.

4. User Responsibilities

When using Xplore, you agree to provide accurate information and abide by local laws.

5. Bookings, Payments, and Refunds

Bookings are confirmed upon receipt of payment. Refunds are subject to our cancellation policy.

6. Cancellation Policy

Cancellations must be made within the specified time to receive applicable refunds.

7. Limitation of Liability

Xplore is not liable for direct or indirect damages from using our platform or third-party disruptions.

8. Intellectual Property Rights

All content on Xplore is owned by us or licensed. You may not reproduce or distribute it without permission.

9. Privacy Policy

Please review our Privacy Policy for information on how we collect, use, and protect your data.

10. Modifications to Terms

We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the changes.

11. Governing Law

These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of [Your Jurisdiction].

Contact Us

If you have any questions, please contact us at:

  • Email: support@xplore.com
  • Phone: +123 456 789
  • Address: 123 Xplore St, Adventure City
); }; export default TermsOfService;
